name: faridoon
description: Faridoon is a self-hosted journaling and note-taking application that emphasizes a calm writing experience and long-term personal knowledge storage. It uses a browser interface and local storage for privacy-respecting journaling.
features: Note-Taking: Calm writing experience, Personal journaling, Long-term knowledge storage. Your thoughts, your space.
Privacy-First: Local storage, No third-party tracking. Complete data ownership.
Browser-Based: Access from anywhere. No installation required.
Minimalist Design: Distraction-free interface. Focus on writing.
Self-Hosted: Run on your own server. Full control.
Markdown Support: Rich text formatting. Flexible writing.
Search: Find notes quickly. Efficient organization.
Tagging: Categorize your thoughts. Easy retrieval.
Export: Backup your notes. Data portability.
